H0.text: Mt. Aconcagua, the highest peak in the Western Hemisphere, stands in which South American country. Argentina

H1.text: Mt. Aconcagua, the highest peak in the Western Hemisphere, stands in which South American country. Chile

H2.text: Mt. Aconcagua, the highest peak in the Western Hemisphere, stands in which South American country. Peru

H3.text: Mt. Aconcagua, the highest peak in the Western Hemisphere, stands in which South American country. Argie

A4.text: Aconcagua is a mountain in the Principal Cordillera of the Andes mountain range, in Mendoza Province, Argentina.

A5.text: It lies 15 km from Argentina's border with Chile.
